sentence.Network_en: The most amazing thing about nature is its infinite variety.
sentence.Network_cn: 大自然最让人惊叹的是它的无限多样性。

sentence.Network_en: The whole universe exists eternally in that one infinite being.
sentence.Network_cn: 整个宇宙在无限的空间中永生。

sentence.Network_en: Human beings have an infinite capacity for self-deception.
sentence.Network_cn: 人类自欺的本事是无穷的。

list.abs: 死循环(Infinite Loop)：是一个永不终止的循环。语法错误(Syntax Error)：是由于拼错一条命令或使用不正确的语法引起的一种错误。

二、无限序列(Infinite Sequence)  设函数f之定义域N为所有自然数时,则称f为一无限序列,由于其函数值可以依序而列出为f(1),f(2), …f(n), …,且其.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin infinitus, from in- 'not' + finitus 'finished, finite' (see finite)

encyclopedia.content: 7人偶像组合Infinite是Hip Hop歌手Tablo作为音乐老师亲自培养的。组合由具备多样魅力的七名成员组成：实力队长金圣圭，肯尼亚派张东雨，有着温柔声音的南优铉，歌舞貌都俱佳的Hoya（李浩沅），初丁李成烈，不爱说话的美男L（金明洙），女生性格的老小李成钟。他们于2010年4月12日通过首次播出的Mnet偶像人间剧场的“INFINITE你是我的哥哥”正式与大家见面。Infinite名字的意思是没有界限无限的。社长希望他们成为没有界限可以继续无限发展的组合。此外，Infinite以无差错的整齐群舞而著名。

entry.def: If you describe something as infinite, you are emphasizing that it is extremely great in amount or degree.

example.ex: With infinite care, John shifted position...
example.tran: 约翰小心翼翼地挪动了位置。

entry.def: Something that is infinite has no limit, end, or edge.

example.ex: Obviously, no company has infinite resources.
example.tran: 显然,没有哪个公司的资源是无限的。

means.word_mean: 1. having no limits or boundaries in time or space or extent or magnitude;
2. of verbs; having neither person nor number nor mood (as a participle or gerund or infinitive);

auth_sentence.content: People expect to have infinite bits wherever they go.
auth_sentence.res_content: People expect to have infinite bits wherever they go.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: People expect to have infinite bits wherever they go.

auth_sentence.content: This is but one SECTOR of the infinite universe.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is but one SECTOR of the infinite universe.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is but one SECTOR of the infinite universe.

auth_sentence.content: For the humble and unfortunate he had infinite charity.
auth_sentence.res_content: For the humble and unfortunate he had infinite charity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For the humble and unfortunate he had infinite charity.

stems_affixes.type_exp: =limit,boundary,end 表示"结束,范围,界限,限制"

stems_affixes.word_buile: de加强+fin界限+ite……的→adj.明确的, 一定的
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+al……的→adj.最后的,最终的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ite……的→adj.有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的
in无+finite[adj.有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的]→adj.无限的,无穷的 n.无限
af一再+fin界限+ity表名词→进入范围内→密切关系

stems_affixes.value_cn: 定义,解释;[轮廓影像等的]清晰度;阐明
stems_affixes.word_buile: de加强+fin界限+ition表名词→划出界限→定义
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ale表示音乐类→终曲
final[adj.最后的,最终的]+ity表名词→n.结尾,定局,终结
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ance表名词→最后起作用的东西→资金
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ish表动词→完成;结束[词性变化:表示名词]
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+itude状态→n.有限
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ity表名词→n.有限, 限定
in无+finite[adj.有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的]→adj.无限的,无穷的 n.无限
infinite[adj.无限的,无穷的 n.无限]+itude状态→infinitude无限,无穷数
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ance表名词→最后起作用的东西→资金
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ish表动词→完成;结束[词性变化:表示名词]

Sentence.sentence: He found that many of his subjects were confused by the infinite options their money presented them with.

Twitter's huge success is rooted in the simple but profound insight that in a medium with infinite space for self-expression, the most interesting thing we can do is restrict ourselves to 140 characters
An investigation found that many of the super-rich were baffled by the infinite choices their money made available.

means.word_mean: 无限的, 无穷的, 无边无际的

sentences.en: The war brought infinite harm to the nation.
sentences.cn: 战争给这个国家带来了无穷的灾难。

jushi.english: The war brought infinite harm to the nation.
jushi.chinese: 战争给这个国家带来了无穷的灾难。

jushi.english: Teaching little children takes infinite patience.
jushi.chinese: 教育幼儿须有极大的耐心。
